DialogueTree.DisplayName: Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya

Node.Text: [AI: Boss accepts challenge with intimidating response]
So, you wish to challenge me? Very well! I, Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya, guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya, accept!
You've drawn first blood... Impressive! But this battle has only just begun!
Enough holding back! WITNESS MY TRUE POWER! I will defend Kazahinomi-no-Miya with everything I have!
You're stronger than I thought... I must be more careful now!
*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
[AI: Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya expresses gratitude/confusion at being spared, yields and offers weapon/gold]
[AI: Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya accepts fate with honor, makes desperate final attack]
You have... bested me... Kazahinomi-no-Miya... is yours... You've earned it...
[AI: Boss protecting Kazahinomi-no-Miya. Theme: Challenge, guardian, test of strength]
[AI: Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: KōtaiJingūInnerShrine, Aramatsurinomiya]
[AI: Guardian of Kazahinomi-no-Miya provides lore about Kazahinomi-no-Miya]
[AI: Farewell message]

DialogueTree.DisplayName: Trader at Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1) Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Trader at Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1)

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant welcomes customer and mentions their wares]

Choice.Text: Let me see your wares (open trade)

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant considers the request based on WillingToBargain trait]

Choice.Text: Ask for a big discount (requires BargainSkill 30+)
Ask for a modest discount (requires BargainSkill 15+)

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant impressed by negotiation skill, agrees to 30% discount]
[AI: Merchant insulted by lowball offer, becomes unfriendly]

Choice.Text: I apologize, can we try again?

Node.Text: [AI: Merchant agrees to reasonable 15% discount]
[AI: Merchant can only offer small 5% courtesy discount]
[AI: Merchant shows their wares]
[AI: Merchant at Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1). Sells region-appropriate goods, shares rumors]

[AI: Trader at Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1) responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: ToyōkeDaijingūOuterShrine_to_Aramatsurinomiya_7, Aramatsurinomiya_to_ToyōkeDaijingūOuterShrine_1]
[AI: Trader at Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1) provides lore about Waypoint between Aramatsuri-no-Miya and Toyōke Daijingū (Outer Shrine) (1)]
